LanguageData.VEF_DisableCorpseDecayingDesc: Disable the constant corpse decaying ability of this animal.
LanguageData.VEF_EnableCorpseDecayingDesc: Enable the constant corpse decaying ability of this animal.
LanguageData.VEF_DisableDiggingDesc: Disable the ability to dig the terrain for food of this animal.
LanguageData.VEF_EnableDiggingDesc: Enable the ability to dig the terrain for food of this animal.
LanguageData.VEF_DisableGasDesc: Disable the ability to produce gas of this animal.
LanguageData.VEF_EnableGasDesc: Enable the ability to produce gas of this animal.
